publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2334 Mike Pringle: Congratulations to Lothian Buses—That the Parliament congratulates Lothian Buses on winning the Bus Operator of the Year Award at the National Transport Awards 2008, adding to its two UK Bus Awards accolades of City Operator of the Year and Bus Operator of the Year; acknowledges the vital role Lothian Buses plays in Edinburgh and the wider Lothian region’s public transport network, as well as the hard work of its staff in delivering an excellent service that has seen passenger numbers rise by over 35% during the last six years; wishes Lothian Buses all the best for the future, and looks forward to the arrival of the tram network to further compliment the excellent service it provides. Supported by: Patrick Harvie*, Jim Hume*, Keith Brown*, Robin Harper*, Liam McArthur*, George Foulkes*, David McLetchie*
S3M-2334 Congratulations to Lothian Buses (lodged on 16 July 2008) Alison McInnes*
